an10.15:1.2.pli: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati. #1
an10.15:1.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

an10.15:2.2.pli: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati. #2
an10.15:2.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

an10.15:3.2.pli: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati. #3
an10.15:3.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

an10.15:10.2.pli: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. Appamādo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī”ti. #10
an10.15:10.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.”

sn45.139:1.3.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā;
sn45.139:1.3.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence,

sn45.139:2.2.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā; appamādo tesaṁ dhammānaṁ aggamakkhāyati.
sn45.139:2.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

sn45.139:3.2.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā; appamādo tesaṁ dhammānaṁ aggamakkhāyati.
sn45.139:3.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

sn45.139:4.2.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā;
sn45.139:4.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence,

sn45.140:1.3.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā; appamādo tesaṁ dhammānaṁ aggamakkhāyati.
sn45.140:1.3.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence, and diligence is said to be the best of them.

mn8:15.1.pli: Seyyathāpi, cunda, ye keci akusalā dhammā sabbe te adhobhāgaṅgamanīyā, ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbe te uparibhāgaṅgamanīyā;
mn8:15.1.en: Cunda, all unskillful qualities lead downwards, while all skillful qualities lead upwards.

mn28:2.2.pli: evameva kho, āvuso, ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbete catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṁ gacchanti.
mn28:2.2.en: In the same way, all skillful qualities can be included in the four noble truths.
